code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import"./Greeting.css";import SocialMedia from"../../components/socialMedia/SocialMedia";import Button from"../../components/button/Button";import{greeting}from"../../portfolio";import{Fade}from"react-reveal";import emoji from"react-easy-emoji";import StyleContext from"../../contexts/StyleContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Greeting(){const{isDark}=useContext(StyleContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Fade,{bottom:true,duration:1000,distance:"40px",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"greet-main",id:"greeting",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"greeting-main",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"greeting-text-div",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{className:isDark?"dark-mode greeting-text":"greeting-text",children:[" ",greeting.title," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"wave-emoji",children:emoji("ðŸ‘‹")})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:isDark?"dark-mode greeting-text-p":"greeting-text-p subTitle",children:greeting.subTitle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SocialMedia,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"button-greeting-div",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{text:"Contact me",href:"#contact"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{text:"See my resume",newTab:true,href:greeting.resumeLink})]})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"greeting-image-div",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{alt:"saad sitting on table",src:require("../../assets/images/manOnTable.svg")})})]})})});}
